channel.title: The Power to Predict
channel.itunes:author: Vivek Ranadive
channel.description: Vivek Ranadivé, author of "The Power to Predict" (March 2006; McGraw-Hill) and author of NY Times Business Bestseller, "The Power of Now," speaks with Tom Foremski, a former Financial Times reporter and founder of Silicon Valley Watcher.com. The interview touches on the book’s introduction by Fred Smith, CEO of FedEx, and covers how business leaders are taking the next step to anticipate customer demand, create opportunities, and beat the competition.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Vivek Ranadivé speaks with Tom Foremski
channel.itunes:summary: Vivek Ranadivé, author of "The Power to Predict" (March 2006; McGraw-Hill) and author of NY Times Business Bestseller, "The Power of Now," speaks with Tom Foremski, a former Financial Times reporter and founder of Silicon Valley Watcher.com.
